Detailed Description

Represents a simulated tracker hit in the simulation.

) [private]

The detector ID. The layer ID. The energy deposited on the hit. The global time of the hit. The X momentum. The Y momentum. The Z momentum. The X position. The Y position. The Z position. The path length of the hit. The particle that caused the hit. The ROOT class definition.
